name: coopsuk
description: Test area for SEA mapping projects

scripts.deploy: rsync -avzc --rsync-path='sudo rsync' --owner="$npm_package_config_deploy_owner" --group="$npm_package_config_deploy_group" --exclude=build.txt --exclude=.* build/out/ "${npm_package_config_deploy_to:?Please define the '$npm_package_name:deploy_to' npm config parameter}"

author: Solidarity Economy Association
